title: Windows 11 bug leaves some user data on disk after a factory reset
content:
A newly-discovered bug in Windows 11 and Windows 10 version 21H2 is leaving some user data unprotected on a disk after a factory reset. The bug, discovered by Rudy Ooms on the Call4CloudÂ blog, means that your data may be easily accessible if you sell or give away your laptop after resetting. This appears to be

The post Windows 11 bug leaves some user data on disk after a factory reset appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A bug has been discovered in Windows 11 and Windows 10 version 21H2, and it could leave some OneDrive files exposed after a factory reset.
